sources.title: Checkmate | Full Movie | Action Adventure | Danny Glover | Vinnie Jones | Michael Paré
sources.description:
Checkmate - Six people are thrown together during an elaborate bank heist where any move can alter the outcome. Is it coincidence, or are they merely pawns in a much bigger game.
2015.  Stars: Danny Glover, Vinnie Jones, Sean Astin, Michael Paré
*Licensed from Cardinal XD Films. All rights reserved*

sources.title: Checkmate | Full Movie | Crime Thriller
sources.description:
Checkmate - In the streets of New York City, a drug war is brewing between bikers and the local drug dealers. A group of corrupt cops have taken the lead on the investigation while trying to set up an honest detective to take the heat. In this dangerous game only one honorable man can stop the war before he's killed by the dishonest cops who betrayed him.
2016.  Stars: James Dinonno, Fat Joe, Alex Maisonette
**Under license from ITN Distribution.  All rights reserved**

metadata.Plot: An assassin gets hired for a job that throws him in a murky pool of mishaps, eventually leading to a baffling secret.
metadata.Actors: Harsh Beniwal, Mohit Chhikara, Aditya Paul
